page.title: 10Gayles House Farm
page.content: My name is{Ian Herring}and I farm at {Gayles House Farm}which is situated in the small village of{Gayles}lying on the higher ground between Richmond and Barnard Castle. It is a family farm and I am helped in the daily tasks by my wife {Mary} and my father{ Robert} who is aged 76 years and who, in spite of being long past retirement age, continues to take an active interest in the farm - like the "old soldiers who never die", old farmers don't retire, "they simply fade away"! Our children{Andrew, Stephen, Rachel}and {Jane}are also able to help with a number of jobs although Andrew isn't really interested in farmwork as such, he would rather be out around the fields with his gun, shooting rabbits. We have{105 acres,}all of it grassland on which we raise and run a herd of 47 dairy cows.
